item.title: SC3 poster
item.description: I am attending the Functional Genomics & Systems Biology: From Model Organisms to Human Health. Here is my poster on SC3 clustering tool for single-cell RNA-Seq data: http://f1000research.com/posters/4-1182 In total our group is presenting 5 posters! Here they are: @wikiselev with poster at #FGSB15 pic.twitter.com/KhxnOGGlUW — Martin Hemberg (@m_hemberg) October 29, 2015 Poster selfie at #FGSB15 pic.twitter.com/UYCwHJJwZB — Martin Hemberg (@m_hemberg) October 29, 2015 Tallulah with poster at #FGSB15 pic.
